definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
the insured person/the person covered by an insurance policy

sentences.english: Did you ever require a cosigner for a loan?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾經有過一個貸款擔保人？

sentences.english: Proposed Insured must be one of the Insured Person(s).
sentences.chinese: 投保人必須爲其中一名受保人。

sentences.english: Proposed Insured must be one of the Insured Person(s).
sentences.chinese: 投保人必須爲其中一名受保人。

sentences.english: But when the policyholder is mortgages people, the situation should be different.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果投保人是抵押權人時，情況又有所不同。

sentences.english: Policy-holder is handing in before two years of cost, expenses expenses is larger.
sentences.chinese: 投保人在交費的前兩年，費用開支較大。

sentences.english: A bondsman is needed in executing a student loan.
sentences.chinese: 辦理助學貸款是需要擔保人的。

sentences.english: What percentage of your professional services is subcontracted to others?
sentences.chinese: 投保人分出該業務的份額是多少？

sentences.english: Analyze reason and countermeasures of responsibility of issuing warrantor.
sentences.chinese: 分析了對開證擔保人的擔保責任的原因及其對策。

sentences.english: Obstructing the giving of notification by the proposer or insured.
sentences.chinese: 妨害要保人或被保險人爲告知者。

sentences.english: Please ensure you have completed all details of all persons to be covered before signing this declaration.
sentences.chinese: 請先填妥所有受保人之資料後，才簽署此聲明。

sentences.english: Necessary arrangement to return deceased Insured's mortal remains to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 安排運送在外地身亡的受保人遺體返回香港。

sentences.english: Insurant can be same person with policy-holder .
sentences.chinese: 被保險人可以與投保人爲同一人。

sentences.english: Was his sponsor oIlhis last legs?
Anne: I forgot to call the bail bondsman.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了打電話給保釋擔保人。

sentences.english: Where do the sureties or Notary Public sign?
sentences.chinese: 擔保人或公證人需要在哪裏簽署？

definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to act as surety for sb/to be sb's guarantor/to stand bail for sb
the insured person/the person covered by an insurance policy
